title: Equity-Centered Mobile Mathematics Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical concepts and workplace-related data interpretation experience
context.additional_context: Customized applied mathematics course for working professionals: Flexible structure design required to accommodate diverse learner backgrounds

learning_goals: Learners can apply statistical techniques (mean, standard deviation, regression analysis) required for analyzing workplace data.
Learners can complete over 90% of 5-minute microlearning content provided in mobile environments and establish self-directed learning plans.
Learners can propose at least two mathematical modeling approaches for solving workplace problems through peer feedback.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
